sections.description: A plugin boilerplate for creating a fully customizable backend admin portal and frontend user portal.
sections.installation: Click the activate button and that's it.
sections.changelog:
v1.1.2 released on May 4th, 2023

  • Fixed: PHP 8 warnings and errors
  • Improvement: Site cloning will copy current source content folder over to new /content/:id:/
  • Improvement: Refresh WP Freighter configs on plugin update
